name: Mahjong Solitaire - Cards
description:
Traditional Mahjong solitaire played with standard tiles or card tiles.

Totally free. No in-app purchases.

A tile if FREE if has not tile on top and no tile to the left or the right. Match up FREE tile pairs to remove them from play. The object is to remove all tiles from play.

Mahjong tile in icon by Jerry Crimson Mann.
